data.name: XIVDeck
data.value: XIVDeck
data.comment: Product name. Do not change.

data.name: StreamDeck
data.value: Stream Deck
data.comment: Product name. Do not change.

data.name: XIVDeck_Title
data.value: XIVDeck Game Plugin
data.comment: The proper title of the Dalamud plugin.

data.name: Exceptions_PlayerNotLoggedIn
data.value: A player is not logged in to the game.
data.comment: Shown when a user attempts to trigger a Stream Deck button without being logged in to the game.

data.name: Exceptions_ActionLocked
data.value: The {0} ID {1} has not been unlocked and cannot be used.

data.name: Exceptions_ActionNotFound
data.value: No {0} with ID {1} was found.

data.name: CommandController_MissingCommandError
data.value: A command to run must be specified.

data.name: CommandController_NotCommandError
data.value: Commands must start with a slash.

data.name: ActionController_UnknownActionTypeError
data.value: No registered action of type {0} was found.

data.name: ClassController_ClassLessThan1Error
data.value: Cannot switch to a class with ID less than 1.

data.name: ClassController_InvalidClassIdError
data.value: A class with ID {0} does not exist!

data.name: ClassController_NoGearsetForClassError
data.value: Couldn't switch to {0} because you don't have a gearset for this class. Create one and try again.

data.name: HotbarController_InvalidHotbarIdError
data.value: Hotbar ID must be between 0 and 17

data.name: HotbarController_NormalHotbarInvalidSlotError
data.value: When Hotbar ID < 10, Slot ID must be between 0 and 11

data.name: HotbarController_CrossHotbarInvalidSlotError
data.value: When Hotbar ID >= 10, Slot ID must be between 0 and 15

data.name: HotbarController_InvalidHotbarOrSlotError
data.value: An invalid hotbar or slot was triggered.

data.name: AuthModule_BadAPIKeyError
data.value: API key missing or invalid.

data.name: WSOpcodeWiring_UnknownOpcodeError
data.value: No message exists with opcode {0}

data.name: EmoteStrategy_EmoteDoesntHaveCommandError
data.value: The emote "{0}" does not have an associated text command.

data.name: EmoteStrategy_EmoteLockedError
data.value: The emote "{0}" isn't unlocked and therefore can't be used.

data.name: ExtraCommandStrategy_NoCommandError
data.value: No command exists for Extra Command {0}. REPORT THIS BUG!
data.comment: This error message is shown when the command to use an "Extra Command" is not found. Because management of extra commands is done manually, additional instructions have been added for the user to report a bug to the developer.

data.name: FixedCommandStrategy_ActionNotFoundError
data.value: An action of type {0} with ID {1} does not exist.

data.name: FixedCommandStrategy_IllegalActionError
data.value: The action with ID {0} is marked as illegal and cannot be used.
data.comment: Shown when the plugin blocks a user from calling an action marked as illegal (unsafe).

data.name: FixedCommandStrategy_SheetNotFoundError
data.value: A sheet of type {0} does not exist.

data.name: SettingsWindow_Title
data.value: XIVDeck Game Plugin Settings

data.name: SettingsWindow_SafeModeDisabledWarning
data.value: DANGER: SAFE MODE DISABLED! You may be able to send illegal commands from your Stream Deck to the game.
data.comment: "Illegal commands" in this case mean commands that normally cannot be sent to the game and may cause damage or harm if proper care is not taken.

data.name: SettingsWindow_ExperimentalSettings
data.value: Experimental Settings
data.comment: Header for configuration window section.

data.name: SettingsWindow_Experiment_MIcon
data.value: Use /micon Icons
data.comment: /micon is a game-provided command. It can be left as-is.

data.name: SettingsWindow_GitHubLink
data.value: XIVDeck GitHub
data.comment: Shown on a button to link to XIVDeck's GitHub page and source code.

data.name: SettingsWindow_ApplyButton
data.value: Apply Settings
data.comment: Used as a "save and apply" button for a settings dialog box. Should be a short string (under 20 characters)

data.name: SettingsWindow_APIPort
data.value: API Port

data.name: SettingsWindow_ListenIP
data.value: Listen IP: {0}

data.name: SettingsWindow_APIPort_Help
data.value:
Changing this setting will re-trigger the Welcome screen.
Default port: {0}, Range: {1}-{2}

data.name: ForcedUpdateNag_Headline
data.value: The XIVDeck Stream Deck Plugin is out of date!

data.name: Nag_OpenGithubDownloadButton
data.value: Open XIVDeck Download Page

data.name: Nag_OpenSettingsButton
data.value: Open XIVDeck Settings

data.name: ForcedUpdateNag_ProblemDescription
data.value: The version of the XIVDeck Stream Deck Plugin currently installed is not compatible with the installed version of the Dalamud Plugin. To re-enable XIVDeck, please download and install the latest version of the Stream Deck Plugin from the button below.

data.name: SetupNag_Headline
data.value: Welcome to XIVDeck!

data.name: SetupNag_ResolutionHelp
data.value: XIVDeck requires the use of the companion XIVDeck Stream Deck plugin to be useful. If you haven't yet downloaded the companion plugin from GitHub, please do so now.

data.name: SetupNag_AlreadyInstalledHelp
data.value: If the XIVDeck Stream Deck Plugin has already been installed, please verify that the port number in the Stream Deck Plugin's configuration is set to {0}, and that you have created at least one button on your Stream Deck.

data.name: SetupNag_CurrentPort
data.value: Current port: {0}

data.name: SetupNag_PortChangeHelp
data.value: If you need to change the port the server is hosted on, you may do so from XIVDeck's settings.

data.name: SetupNag_DismissHelp
data.value: This message will automatically be dismissed once the Stream Deck Plugin has been detected.

data.name: CollectionStrategy_CollectionNotFoundError
data.value: No Collection with ID {0} exists.

data.name: GearsetStrategy_GearsetNotFoundError
data.value: No gearset exists in slot number {0}.

data.name: GeneralActionStrategy_ActionLockedError
data.value: The action "{0}" is not yet unlocked.

data.name: GeneralActionStrategy_ActionIllegalError
data.value: The action "{0}" (ID {1}) is marked as illegal and cannot be used.
data.comment: Shown when the plugin blocks a user from calling an action marked as illegal (unsafe).

data.name: InstrumentStrategy_PerformanceLockedError
data.value: Performance mode hasn't been unlocked yet.
data.comment: Shown when a user attempts to use a musical instrument without having Performance actions unlocked.

data.name: InstrumentStrategy_CurrentlyPerformingError
data.value: Cannot switch instruments while in Performance mode.
data.comment: Shown when a user attempts to switch musical instruments while actively in a Performance.

data.name: InstrumentStrategy_InstrumentNotFoundError
data.value: No instrument with ID {0} exists.
data.comment: Shown when a user attempts to use an invalid or unknown musical instrument.

data.name: MacroStrategy_MacroEmptyError
data.value: The specified macro is empty and cannot be used.

data.name: MainCommandStrategy_ActionInvalidError
data.value: Main command action ID {0} is not valid.

data.name: MinionStrategy_MinionNotFoundError
data.value: No minion with ID {0} exists.

data.name: MinionStrategy_MinionLockedError
data.value: The minion "{0}" isn't unlocked and therefore can't be used.

data.name: MountStrategy_MountNotFoundError
data.value: No mount with ID {0} exists.

data.name: MountStrategy_MountLockedError
data.value: The mount "{0}" isn't unlocked and therefore can't be used.

data.name: OrnamentStrategy_OrnamentLockedError
data.value: The fashion accessory "{0}" isn't unlocked and therefore can't be used.

data.name: ErrorHandler_ErrorPrefix
data.value: {0} - ERROR

data.name: TickScheduler_ExceptionHandler
data.value: There was an issue running a task: {0}: {1}
data.comment: "Task" may be substituted for "job" in this case. This string will display when a background job fails to execute.

data.name: GameClass_NotFoundError
data.value: A class with ID {0} does not exist.

data.name: GameClass_UncategorizedError
data.value: Unrecognized job category for class ID {0}. REPORT THIS BUG!
data.comment: Shown when plugin data is invalid and requires an update from the developer.

data.name: WSInitOpcode_ThanksForInstall
data.value: Thank you for installing the Stream Deck plugin. XIVDeck is now ready to go!

data.name: ClassController_FallbackClassUsed
data.value: No gearset was found for {0}, so your gearset for {1} was used instead.

data.name: SettingsWindow_XIVDeckPortOpen
data.value: XIVDeck is accessible from computers on your network!

data.name: SettingsWindow_ListenOnNetwork
data.value: Listen on All Interfaces

data.name: SettingsWindow_UseMIcon_Help
data.value:
When this option is enabled, the Stream Deck will respect any /micon commands in macros. When disabled, the Stream Deck will only show the Macro Icon from the provided drop-down.
Default: Off

data.name: TestingUpdateNag_Headline
data.value: Warning: XIVDeck Testing Version Mismatch

data.name: TestingUpdateNag_MismatchDetectedText
data.value: A version mismatch was detected between the currently-installed version of the Stream Deck Plugin and the Game Plugin. Certain features may not work properly.

data.name: TestingUpdateNag_PleaseTestProperly
data.value: In order to properly help test XIVDeck releases, you need to be on the correct (matching) version of the Stream Deck Plugin. Please use the below button to download the correct version of the Stream Deck Plugin for your testing build.

data.name: TestingUpdateNag_DismissHelp
data.value: This message may be dismissed, but will reappear so long as test mode is enabled and a version mismatch is detected.

data.name: TestingUpdateNag_IgnoreButton
data.value: Ignore For Now

data.name: TestingUpdateNag_DownloadButton
data.value: Download v{0}

data.name: WSInitOpcode_GamePluginOutdated
data.value: The version of the XIVDeck Stream Deck Plugin installed is newer than the game plugin. Please install any updates from the Dalamud Plugin Installer.

data.name: ForcedUpdateNag_SupportInfo
data.value: Stuck? Visit the XIVLauncher & Dalamud Discord for help!

data.name: ForcedUpdateNag_SupportButton
data.value: Open Discord

data.name: ForcedUpdateNag_BypassInstructions
data.value: To ignore this error temporarily, hold CTRL. This will not re-enable the plugin.

data.name: ForcedUpdateNag_BypassButton
data.comment: Shown when the user is given the option to temporarily ignore the update error.
data.value: Ignore For Now

data.name: VersionUtils_UpdateAlert_Link
data.value: {0}version {1}
data.comment: Highlighted section of the update message and used as the link to GitHub. {0} is the "play" icon, {1} is the version number. {0} must be at the start of the message.

data.name: VersionUtils_UpdateAlert
data.value: Your version of the XIVDeck Stream Deck Plugin is out of date. Please consider installing {0} from GitHub!
data.comment: General message notifying the user of a version update. The {0} is replaced with a colored link to GitHub ("version 1.2.3") for updating named `VersionUtils_UpdateAlert_Link`. Only *one* {0} is permitted!!

data.name: MainCommandStrategy_MainCommandLocked
data.value: The main command "{0}" cannot be used at this time.

data.name: SetupNag_HowInstall
data.value: Wait, how do I install this?

data.name: SetupNag_HowInstall_Requirements
data.value: In order to install XIVDeck, you need an Elgato Stream Deck and the Stream Deck software.

data.name: SetupNag_HowInstall_Steps
data.value: 1. Visit the XIVDeck Download Page using the button above. 2. Download "XIVDeck.streamDeckPlugin" and open it. 3. When prompted, choose to install the custom action.

data.name: SetupNag_HowInstall_OtherInfo
data.value: The Stream Deck application will take care of the rest and set the plugin up with the default settings.

data.name: SetupNag_AlreadyInstalled
data.value: Already Installed the Companion Plugin?

data.name: SetupNag_JoinDiscord
data.value: Click to join the Discord!

data.name: XIVDeckWebServer_RunException
data.value: XIVDeck's server has unexpectedly failed and has been disabled. Please restart your game. If this keeps happening, please report this bug!

data.name: PortInUseNag_Title
data.value: The XIVDeck API port is already in use!

data.name: PortInUseNag_PortIsAlreadyInUse
data.value: XIVDeck has detected that port {0} is

data.name: PortInUseNag_PortAlreadyInUse
data.value: XIVDeck has detected that port {0} is already in use by another application.

data.name: PortInUseNag_ResolutionInstructions
data.value: In order to use XIVDeck, this port must be changed to a free one. To do this, please choose a new port number in the XIVDeck Game Plugin settings, and enter that same port number in the XIVDeck Stream Deck Plugin settings.

data.name: PortInUseNag_IgnoreForNow
data.value: Ignore For Now

data.name: MultiboxNag_MultiboxingDetected
data.value: XIVDeck has detected another instance of Final Fantasy XIV running on your computer. As such, it has been disabled in this client.

data.name: MultiboxNag_MultiboxingIsUnsupported
data.value: Multiboxing is unsupported and there may be unexpected behavior. If your Stream Deck no longer works after receiving this message, please restart all instances of your game client.

data.name: MultiboxNag_SuppressWarning
data.value: Don't show this warning again.

data.name: MultiboxNag_CloseButton
data.value: Close

data.name: MultiboxNag_ChatWarning
data.value: Multiboxing has been detected. XIVDeck might not work properly!

data.name: SetupNag_MessageWillReturn
data.value: This message will return on every game launch!

data.name: SetupNag_BypassButton
data.value: Ignore for now

data.name: SetupNag_BypassHint
data.value: Don't care? Hold CTRL to bypass this dialog!

data.name: WSInitOpcode_PluginUpdateAvailableNotificationTitle
data.value: Plugin Update Available

data.name: WSInitOpcode_SDPluginUpdateBody
data.value:
Some features may not be available or work properly.
Click this notification to

data.name: WSInitOpcode_SDPluginUpdateNotificationBody
data.value:
Version {0} of the XIVDeck Stream Deck Plugin is currently outdated. Some features may not be available or work properly.
Click this notification to go to the version {1} download page.
